hero.title: Unleash your car's potential
hero.subtitle: High-performance tuning, engine builds, forced induction, and custom fabrication. Dyno-proven results. Track-tested reliability. Whether street or strip, we build machines that perform. Passion for speed, precision in execution.

about.title: Performance Specialists
about.subtitle: Building fast cars since 2012
about.content: Apex Performance specializes in high-performance builds for enthusiasts who demand more. From bolt-ons to complete engine builds, our experienced team combines technical expertise with a passion for speed. Dyno tuning, turbo/supercharger kits, suspension, and more.

products.name: ECU Tuning (Dyno)
products.description: Custom dyno tune for maximum power and drivability. 3-4 pulls minimum. Includes before/after dyno sheets.

products.name: Turbo Kit Installation
products.description: Complete turbo system install with tuning. Garrett or Precision turbo. 50-150HP gains typical.

products.name: Engine Build
products.description: Complete performance engine build. Forged internals, head work, cam upgrade. Built for power and reliability.

products.name: Coilover Suspension
products.description: Performance coilover install and corner balancing. BC, KW, or Ohlins. Transform handling.

products.name: Exhaust System
products.description: Custom exhaust fabrication or brand-name system install. More power, better sound.

products.name: Track Prep Package
products.description: Prepare your car for track days. Brake fluid, pads, alignment, safety inspection. Ready to race.

items.text: Apex built my turbo WRX and it's an absolute beast! 400WHP on pump gas and daily driver reliable. Dyno tune is perfect. Best shop for Subarus!
items.author: Tyler Morrison
items.title: WRX Owner

items.text: Had them tune my Civic Si. Gained 30HP and it drives so much better. Professional, knowledgeable, and passionate about what they do. Highly recommend!
items.author: Marcus Chen
items.title: Honda Enthusiast

items.text: They built my LSX Miata and it's a track weapon! Clean fabrication, reliable power, and it handles like a dream. Worth every penny!
items.author: Sarah Rodriguez
items.title: Track Day Regular

members.name: Jake Daniels
members.title: Owner & Master Tuner
members.bio: 10+ years building and tuning performance cars. Certified HP Tuners and Cobb Tuning specialist. Former race team mechanic. Passionate about building fast, reliable machines.
